text:
@newtgingrich @RepTomReed NY Gov Cuomo coronavirus nursing home disaster 
The Total of COVID-19 32,206 deaths. Highest in our nation.

Now all of a sudden New York is at a stand still of patients with Coronavirus.

Very hard to believe.

Cuomo has to covering up something https://t.co/xNknsAskVr
